resources.string: Please select folder containing game data files:
No Stratagus data files were found in

Stratagus is a real-time strategy gaming engine.\ Games which use Stratagus:\ Wargus, War1gus, Stargus, Aleona\'s Tales and Wyrmsun\n\ To actually play anything you will need to generate \'game data files\' on your PC and copy them to your device.\ Please visit https://drodin.com/stratagus for instructions.\n\ Note: \'game data files\' generated for the first version of Stratagus (0.8.5 beta) are not compatible with the current version!
